methods.name: ParseJSON
methods.description: Shows values that can be extracted from the provided JSON and returns a specific value when a field name is specified

params.name: --nesting
params.description: Parsing depth limit. Full depth by default

params.name: --name
params.description: Field name to retrieve. Displays the entire list if not specified

methods.name: ConvertBase64ToBinary
methods.description: Convert file with Base64 string to binary file
